original_text: Then a spirit lifted me up and took me into the temple's inside yard. As I watched, the Lord's glory filled the temple.
korean_text: 영이 나를 들어 데리고 안뜰에 들어가시기로 내가 보니 여호와의 영광이 성전에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: Then a spirit lifted me up
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 한 영이 나를 들어 올렸고

sentences.original_text: and took me into the temple's inside yard
the Lord's glory filled the temple
